Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line service running w/delays due to signal problems at O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service running w/delays due to signal problems at O'Hare.

At this time, consider other service alternatives to service your trip such as other buses or buses to other rail lines. 

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
